```{r setup}
library(knitr)
library(swfscAirDAS)
```


See below for format requirements for AirDAS data expected by this package. In addition, you can view the pdf located at the following location:
```{r}
system.file("AirDAS_Format.pdf", package = "swfscAirDAS")
```

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(system.file("AirDAS_Format_Page_1.png", package = "swfscAirDAS"), dpi = 500)

knitr::include_graphics(system.file("AirDAS_Format_Page_3.png", package = "swfscAirDAS"), dpi = 500)
```
